content: उमा [ओः शिवस्य मा लक्ष्मीरिव, उं शिवं माति मन्यते पतित्वेन मा-क वा <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the daughter of Himavat and Menā and wife of Śiva; Kālidāsa thus derives the name:-- उ मेति (oh do not, {%<ab>scil.</ab>%} practise penance) मात्रा तपसो निषिद्धा पश्चादुमाख्यां सुमुखी जगाम <ls>Ku. 1. 26</ls>; उमावृषांकौ <ls>R. 3. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Light, splendour. {@--3@} Fame, reputation. {@--4@} Tranquility, calmness. {@--5@} Night. {@--6@} Turmeric (हरिद्रा). {@--7@} Flax (अतसी).
